Reviews.Title: “great hotel, great location”

Reviews.Content: hotel locate 10 min walk city center lot free parking street breakfast registered look hotel free wireless 3 days internet choose move hotel internet free charge

Reviews.Title: “Stinky room & got stuck outside the hotel at 1am with -8 C!”
Reviews.Author: acumpreto
Reviews.Content: avoid hotel especially dont smoke woman traveling own stunk smoke stuck outside hotel 1am 8 degrees cause front door hadnt fixed couldnt reception emergency phone didnt detailed review read rest central opposite bahn practical cheep size quality hotel reception staff ok option wanna visit berlin value money stunk smoke awful hadnt smoking smelled bad aired smelled dont surprises avoid worse reception closes 11pm event 1am door outside wouldnt electronic card perfectly stayed 10 minutes trying pulling hard etc happened im girl trying hotel 1am night 8 degrees freezing trying inside doesnt lot lights bahn station dodgy drunken weird people cheep bars street waking worrying door saying call 2 emergency dialed takes reservations line 5 minutes picked emergency line lastly hotel block walk help affiliated walk past dodgy bars guy reception door heavy strong pull told pulling 10 minutes mentioned theyre telling hotel management fix door day theyre doing dont pay cant money fix door guy tall strong trouble door hotel doesnt fix front door clients risk recommend near hotel unless dont care happen cheep hotels near cheep didnt unfortunatelly

Reviews.Title: “Great value and location but not suitable for all.”
Reviews.Author: mattfromlancs
Reviews.Content: standard price budget berlin cleanliness excellent bathroom odd choices detract slightly single duvets double beds cheap sticking cubicle despite superb shower etc overall doesnt hate slightly soulless décor happy staff helpful questions didnt tell location schonfeld outside mitte words city centre opposite subway station close shops restaurants review suggested location sleazy wrong gay district rough party spot despite bars nearby sleep quality bed wasnt mega comfy warm electric blinds dont close dark youre light sleeper hotel people real

Reviews.Title: “Excellent budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: JohnFromSheffield
Reviews.Content: stayed nights excellent little hotel money comfortable quiet warm excellent shower didnt eat breakfast looked nice friendly helpful reception approximately 20 minute walk sony centre north kadewe east mentioned theres ladies night ignore tourists issue definitely stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “Would stay there again!”
Reviews.Author: Simon Y
Reviews.Content: admit reading reviews cancelled reservation booked elsewhere im glad didnt im saying people havent bad experiences wording ratings lean towards doing utmost ruin future custom hotel experience located u2 line couple hundred yards central u1 line ideal getting berlin city centre 10 minutes welcome reception arrived staff spoke 5 days stayed pleasant 1st floor facing station opposite meant curtains people cleanliness excellent spacious maid service day expected noisy wasnt lighting bit dim kettle im sorry wasnt persuade verbally trashed tripadvisor goes yes people commented prostitutes hanging station night 5 6 hardly throngs hassling street feel unsafe neighbourhood day night lot safer uk breakfast hotel 7 euros 50 plenty couple stops ubahn 6 euros cafe alex sony centre potsdamer platz eat 620 11am hungry late night hotel door literally opposite sex shop str describe takeaway stall friendly guy food excellent huge chicken kebab 3 euros 1520 minutes walk opposite direction straight line excellent vietnamese restaurant situated corner sorry cant remember name nice cheap stay recommend previous reviewers slated save money stay ritz hilton potsdamer platz thats quality accommodation strive berlin enjoy wonderful amazing

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel with great location and huuuge rooms”
Reviews.Author: mostorm
Reviews.Content: trip berlin extended weekend thursday night sunday afternoon booked hotel received gift certificate choice own stay difficulties recognizing previous positive reviews hotel situated str ubahn station albeit shut visit station blocks fifth floor possibly largest hotel stayed okay furnishing panorama windows giving nice view surrounding city booked breakfast included pleasant experience assortments egg bread cheese sausages ham fresh fruit jams whatever belongs breakfast buffet departure allowed car stay hotel parking cellar pick afternoon reception staff friendly occasion definitely return trip fantastic city

Reviews.Content: cant comment standard hotel nice reception arrival following message employees reception im sorry cant stay prior written email booking registered answer positive welcome stay hotel apparently booking system broken day prior arrival therefor recieved overwhelming amount bookings led booked hotel sound bit strange considering gotten email confirming booking recieved fine luckily managed aldea hotel sister hotel street costs addition strange hotel contact future guests inform situation message reception person confused handle hopefully hasnt guests experience

Reviews.Title: “very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rob188636
Reviews.Content: rebuilt rate lower excellent breakfast specially soft boiled eggs equipt prepare food underground parking minus reception till 9pm keys shop sth dont remember anyway recommand hotel nice time

Reviews.Title: “Good value, with caveats”
Reviews.Author: familytravelers54
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights hotel city mixed reviews positives 1 price 2 located major city train stop convenient sights eastern western city 3 internet free 4 breakfast buffet excellent 5 washers dryers available 6 staff helpful negatives 1 facing courtyard street ac hotel windows survive major street train stop noisy day night sleep bad street hotel quieter cooler 2 particularly clean hotel 3 flickering automatic hallway lighting creepy feeling
